name: roleset
description: Create or modify a mutually exclusive set of roles

options.name: create
options.description: Creates a mutually exclusive set of roles

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new role set being created

options.name: delete
options.description: Remove an existing mutually exclusive set of roles

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the existing role set to be removed

options.name: add
options.description: Add a role to an existing exclusive role set

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the existing role set to add the role to

options.name: role
options.description: The role to add to this mutually exclusive role set

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a role currently part of an exclusive role set

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the existing role set to remove a role from

options.name: role
options.description: The role to remove from this mutually exclusive role set

options.name: list
options.description: List existing sets of mutually exclusive roles.
